title: Kin`iro no Chord: Secondo Passo
alternative_title: Kiniro no Corda: Secondo Passo, 金色のコルダ セコンド・パッソ
description: Following the intraschool competition at Seiso Academy, budding music student Kahoko meets brusque boy Eto, the new school board director Akihiko Kira, and the mysterious transfer student Aoi Kaji.
